I like putting a lot of lights on my stations as it makes it easier to see when on the dark side of a planet. I have found that the lights flicker at times. Is this a bug or a feature?

Edited August 12, 2013 by ansaman

If you have more lights shining on the same spot that the settings>graphics>pixel light count (defaults to 8), then it will rapidly switch which 8 lights are being shown causing the appearance of flicker.
